vlive.korean: 혹시 상대 배역으로 괜찮으신가요? Is he okay as an acting partner? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#457. 상상플러스 (스페셜 DJ 틴탑 니엘&리키 with 라붐)
vlive.english: Is he okay as an acting partner?

vlive.korean: [진영이 원하는 다음 배역?] 다음 드라마는 또 어떤 역할 해보고 싶어? [What does JINYOUNG want to play?] What role would you want to play in a drama? 듣기 View video GOT7 : [GOT2DAY 2019] 21. JB & Jinyoung
vlive.english: [What does JINYOUNG want to play?] What role would you want to play in a drama?

vlive.korean: 아니.. 갑자기 여기.. 여기 배역에 있는 뭐지? No... Suddenly, here... What's that about the parts? 듣기 View video 스튜디오 픽또 / PICK DDO : 병민&일짱이와 함께하는 추억여행
vlive.english: No... Suddenly, here... What's that about the parts?

vlive.korean: 그럼 배역은 하나에요. There's only one role. 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 포스터 나왔어요!!!
나의 배역 나의 캐릭터. - 캐릭터. My role. My character. - Character. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]우리가 만난 기적 X 앞터V (The miracle we met X Early Interview)

examples.korean: Studying cows, pigs and chickens can help an actor develop his character. There are a lot of things I learned from animals. One was that they couldn't hiss or boo me. (James Dean) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 소나 돼지, 닭을 관찰하는 것은 배우가 자신의 배역을 발전시키는 데 도움을 줄 수 있다. 나는 동물을 보고 많은 것을 배웠다. 그 중 하나는 동물은 내게 야유할 수 없다는 것이다. (제임스 딘, 동물명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Studying cows, pigs and chickens can help an actor develop his character. There are a lot of things I learned from animals. One was that they couldn't hiss or boo me. (James Dean) Add to Wordbook
